articles.description: The inevitable problems of Chelsea's bloated squad start even before the season kicks off with Raheem Sterling accused of letting his team-mates down by a pundit.
articles.title: Raheem Sterling statement shows size of Enzo Maresca's task at Chelsea

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as Mallorca take on Real Madrid in La Liga.
articles.title: La Liga LIVE: Mallorca vs Real Madrid - score & text updates

articles.description: Oval Invincibles win The Hundred for the second year running with a convincing victory over Southern Brave in the final at Lord’s.
articles.title: The Hundred final 2024: Oval Invincibles retain title with win over Southern Brave

articles.description: Erling Haaland is compared to Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo after scoring his 91st goal for Manchester City in his 100th appearance.
articles.title: Erling Haaland: Manchester City striker's record is like 'Ronaldo and Messi'

articles.description: Brentford start their season with a narrow win over Crystal Palace despite leaving out striker Ivan Toney over "transfer interest".
articles.title: Brentford start season with late win over Palace

articles.description: Japan's Hideki Matsuyama gives up a five-shot overnight lead before recovering to win the FedEx St. Jude Championship in Tennessee.
articles.title: FedEx St. Jude Championship: Japan's Hideki Matsuyama wins in Tennessee

articles.description: London Spirit are celebrating winning The Hundred for the first time after a thrilling four-wicket win over Welsh Fire in the Lord's final.
articles.title: The Hundred 2024 final: London Spirit win low-scoring thriller against Welsh Fire

articles.description: Chelsea fans react to their 2-0 defeat to Manchester City in their opening game of the Premier League.
articles.title: Chelsea 0-2 Manchester City: Chelsea fans react to loss

articles.description: Following a heated build-up to their fight at UFC 305, Israel Adesanya and Dricus du Plessis agree that Africa was the real winner of the night after the pair settled their differences.
articles.title: UFC 305: 'Africa won tonight', say Israel Adesanya and Dricus du Plessis

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats followed by match report from Celtic vs Hibernian in the Scottish League Cup.
articles.title: Celtic vs Hibernian: Scottish League Cup - BBC Sport
